Carol's Daughter Repairing Shampoo - Imported (250 ml) Price: Rs.4000

Carol's Daughter Repairing Shampoo Monoi 8. 5 fl oz. A Sulfate-free Shampoo to Undo and Prevent Damage. the Monoi Repairing Shampoo cleanses and detangles while restoring strength to even the most distressed hair. Only strong hair can grow into longer hair so you re free to wear any style. That s why the strand-strengthening Monoi Oil - an ancient recipe made from the rejuvenating Tahitian Tiare Gardenia Flower and Coprah Coconut Oil - is a must-have to help repair fine delicate or chemically-treated hair. Details: Monoi Oil gently conditions your hair all over Hibiscus Extract help quickly detangle any hair type but especially delicate damaged hair Coconut-derived cleansers are gentle enough for even the most fragile distressed hair When used with the Monoi Repairing Conditioner: 92% less breakage after only 1 use 5. 5X longer hair life after only 1 use 82% better conditioning and detangling after only 1 use p
